programme.title: Most Shocking Celebrity Deaths
programme.desc: A look at ten giants of the music industry, from Elvis to Lennon, that were taken from us.

programme.title: Elvis Presley: Shook Up
programme.desc: A new documentary uncovering the haunting story behind Elvis Presley's charm, fame, and flaws.

programme.title: The Last 24 Hours: Elvis Presley
programme.desc: Elvis' closest friends share their memories and experiences and what really happened during his final hours.

programme.title: The Last 24 Hours: Prince
programme.desc: A look into the last 24 hours Prince's death as investigators search for more answers as to what happened.

programme.title: Diana: The Night She Died
programme.desc: The death of Princess Diana left the world stunned. Explore the questions and theories following her passing.

programme.title: Hollywood Homicide Uncovered
programme.desc: Homicide Detective Ron Ito works to uncover the secrets behind the 2001 murder of actor Robert Blake's wife.

programme.title: Hollywood Homicide Uncovered
programme.desc: An investigator uncovers the truth behind the death of an actress found dead inside Phil Spector's home.

programme.title: Hollywood Homicide Uncovered
programme.desc: Homicide Detective Tom Lange's investigation into O.J. Simpson's murder charges.

programme.title: Welcome to Death Row
programme.desc: The true story of the rise and fall of Death Row Records.

programme.title: Lil Nas X: Unlikely Cowboy
programme.desc: A look into how Lil Nas X carved his way to fame through the unapologetic celebration of his queer identity.

programme.title: Sabrina Carpenter: Breve y Dulce
programme.desc: De estrella infantil a ícono global, Sabrina Carpenter está transformando la música. Su historia aquí.

programme.title: Chappell Roan: Your Favourite Artist
programme.desc: Explore Chappell Roan’s rise to fame as she redefines pop music--one glittery step at a time.

programme.title: Charli XCX: Chica Brat
programme.desc: Explora el ascenso de Charli XCX, del mixtape al pop, siempre desafiando los límites del sonido.

programme.title: The Story of Super Mario
programme.desc: Explore the history of Super Mario, Nintendo's iconic character that changed the world of gaming forever.

programme.title: Foo Fighters: One Less Hero
programme.desc: The rise of rock band Foo Fighters, from their start to the tragic loss of beloved drummer Taylor Hawkins.

programme.title: Rolling Stone Magazine: Stories From The Edge
programme.desc: A deep dive into the magazine’s origins and its early growth into a cultural and political pacesetter.

programme.title: Rolling Stone Magazine: Stories From The Edge
programme.desc: Exploring the unique relationship with John Lennon and the coverage of Nixon's re-election campaign.

programme.title: Post Malone: On His Terms
programme.desc: A look into Post Malone, a unique artist blending hip-hop, pop, R&B, and country music styles.

programme.title: Diddy: Monster’s Fall
programme.desc: A look into the accusations, lawsuits, and charges against hip-hop star and media mogul, Sean "Diddy" Combs.

programme.title: Biggie & Tupac
programme.desc: An examination of Tupac and Biggie's deaths, highlighting their hip hop rivalry in the late 90s.

programme.title: Thick as Thieves
programme.desc: A thief (Alec Baldwin) is set up by an ambitious gangster, sparking a deadly game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Two vigilante brothers try to wipe out Boston's criminal underworld. Willem Dafoe and Norman Reedus star.
